result.eng: I spent three years over there.
result.ga: Chaith mé trí bliana thall ansin

result.eng: The project was finished at long last in 2004.

result.eng: I met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.
result.ga: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thall
